name: Descent PSP
description:
Description

As a lost soul you have to explore the dungeon to find a way out. You'll need to obtain new abilities to progress, but they do not come for free...

Made with C and SDL 2 for the Sony PSP. Credits and other info included with game. Tested with PPSSPP (1.9.3) and optimized for the PSP 1000.

Thank you to all involved in arranging the jam! I have been learning C as a hobby during the quarantine and this was a good opportunity write code optimized for a less powerful system.

Special thanks to Iridescence, who inspired me to join the jam.
Keep up the good work!
